title: Richard Savignac
text: Richard Savignac (born 11 January 1905) was a French <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who competed in the <a href="1924%20Summer%20Olympics">1924 Summer Olympics</a>. In 1924, he was eliminated in the second round of the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201924%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20lightweight">lightweight class</a> after losing his fight to the upcoming gold medalist <a href="Hans%20Jacob%20Nielsen">Hans Jacob Nielsen</a>.
